content.rendered:
For all sparkling rose admirers! Experience the fusion of elegance and taste with the collaboration between renowned designer Georg Jensen and leading sparkling winemakers, Heemskerk. Elevate your celebration with this uniquely curated sparkling rose, complemented by the timeless aesthetic of a Georg Jensen wine stopper.

Presented in our signature gift bag and trailing ribbon. Designed to complement our fresh flower and indoor plant range.

To order and receive this product, you must be over 18 years of age. You can only include alcohol as an additional item with your flower purchase. Please note that purchasing alcohol separately from flowers is not allowed, as per Queensland Liquor Licensing laws.

Delivery calculated at checkout.
